1 #!/usr/bin/env python
2 """
3 Panda UI Controller.
4 To use this please install the dependencies:
5 sudo pip install kivy
6 sudo pip install pygame
7 """
8 from kivy.app import App
9 from kivy.uix.slider import Slider
10 from kivy.uix.gridlayout import GridLayout
11 from kivy.uix.label import Label
12 import sys
13 import rospkg
14 sys.path.append(rospkg.RosPack().get_path('ros_robotic_skin'))
15 from scripts.controllers.PandaController import PandaController # noqa: E402
16 
17 
18 class panda_position_mover(GridLayout):
19  def __init__(self, **kwargs):
20  super(panda_position_mover, self).__init__(**kwargs)
21  self.controller = PandaController()
22  # Start from default value in sliders
23  self.controller.publish_positions([0.0, 0.0, 0.0, -0.0698, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0], 0.1)
24  # GUI starting
25  self.cols = 3
26  # The limits are from the website:
27  # https://frankaemika.github.io/docs/control_parameters.html
28  my_slider1 = Slider(min=-2.8973, max=2.8973, step=0.001, value=0, id="Joint 1")
29  my_slider2 = Slider(min=-1.7628, max=1.7628, step=0.001, value=0, id="Joint 2")
30  my_slider3 = Slider(min=-2.8973, max=2.8973, step=0.001, value=0, id="Joint 3")
31  my_slider4 = Slider(min=-3.0718, max=-0.0698, step=0.001, value=-0.0698, id="Joint 4")
32  my_slider5 = Slider(min=-2.8973, max=2.8973, step=0.001, value=0, id="Joint 5")
33  my_slider6 = Slider(min=-0.0175, max=3.7525, step=0.001, value=0, id="Joint 6")
34  my_slider7 = Slider(min=-2.8973, max=2.8973, step=0.001, value=0, id="Joint 7")
35 
36  # I know this can be upgraded but I just wrote
37  # Joint 1
38  self.add_widget(Label(text='Panda Joint 1'))
39  self.add_widget(my_slider1)
40  self.joint1_value = Label(text='0')
41  self.add_widget(self.joint1_value)
42  my_slider1.bind(value=self.slider_value_change)
43 
44  # Joint 2
45  self.add_widget(Label(text='Panda Joint 2'))
46  self.add_widget(my_slider2)
47  self.joint2_value = Label(text='0')
48  self.add_widget(self.joint2_value)
49  my_slider2.bind(value=self.slider_value_change)
50 
51  # Joint 3
52  self.add_widget(Label(text='Panda Joint 3'))
53  self.add_widget(my_slider3)
54  self.joint3_value = Label(text='0')
55  self.add_widget(self.joint3_value)
56  my_slider3.bind(value=self.slider_value_change)
57 
58  # Joint 4
59  self.add_widget(Label(text='Panda Joint 4'))
60  self.add_widget(my_slider4)
61  self.joint4_value = Label(text='-0.0698')
62  self.add_widget(self.joint4_value)
63  my_slider4.bind(value=self.slider_value_change)
64 
65  # Joint 5
66  self.add_widget(Label(text='Panda Joint 5'))
67  self.add_widget(my_slider5)
68  self.joint5_value = Label(text='0')
69  self.add_widget(self.joint5_value)
70  my_slider5.bind(value=self.slider_value_change)
71 
72  # Joint 6
73  self.add_widget(Label(text='Panda Joint 6'))
74  self.add_widget(my_slider6)
75  self.joint6_value = Label(text='0')
76  self.add_widget(self.joint6_value)
77  my_slider6.bind(value=self.slider_value_change)
78 
79  # Joint 7
80  self.add_widget(Label(text='Panda Joint 7'))
81  self.add_widget(my_slider7)
82  self.joint7_value = Label(text='0')
83  self.add_widget(self.joint7_value)
84  my_slider7.bind(value=self.slider_value_change)
85 
86  def slider_value_change(self, instance, joint_value):
87  if instance.id == "Joint 1":
88  self.joint1_value.text = "%f" % joint_value
89  elif instance.id == "Joint 2":
90  self.joint2_value.text = "%f" % joint_value
91  elif instance.id == "Joint 3":
92  self.joint3_value.text = "%f" % joint_value
93  elif instance.id == "Joint 4":
94  self.joint4_value.text = "%f" % joint_value
95  elif instance.id == "Joint 5":
96  self.joint5_value.text = "%f" % joint_value
97  elif instance.id == "Joint 6":
98  self.joint6_value.text = "%f" % joint_value
99  elif instance.id == "Joint 7":
100  self.joint7_value.text = "%f" % joint_value
101  positions = [float(self.joint1_value.text),
102  float(self.joint2_value.text),
103  float(self.joint3_value.text),
104  float(self.joint4_value.text),
105  float(self.joint5_value.text),
106  float(self.joint6_value.text),
107  float(self.joint7_value.text)
108  ]
109  self.controller.publish_positions(positions, 0.1)
110 
111 
112 class PandaSlider(App):
113  def build(self):
114  widgetcontainer = panda_position_mover()
115  return widgetcontainer
116 
117 
118 if __name__ == "__main__":
119  PandaSlider().run()
